title: Update Page 2 birthday message text in centralized story content

requirements.summary: Update Page 2 centralized heading and paragraphs in storyContent to match the provided birthday message exactly, preserving emojis, punctuation, ellipses, and line breaks while leaving all other behavior unchanged.
acceptanceCriteria: Page 2 (route "/page2") renders a heading that matches the first line of the provided message exactly, including emojis and capitalization.
Page 2 renders the remaining message content exactly as provided, preserving line breaks and spacing (including the double-space in "aur  un dino"), when viewed in the browser.
No changes occur to Page 1 letter text, Page 3 final message, navigation routes, or sessionStorage gating logic.

file_operations.description: Replace storyContent.page2.heading and storyContent.page2.paragraphs so they match the user-provided message exactly as given (including emojis, punctuation, ellipses, and all line breaks/spacing such as the double-space in "aur  un dino"), without modifying any other keys or content for other pages.
